mapper.select: select count(b.data_content) total ,b.data_content from student_info a,data_dictionary b where a.student_sate =b.data_id group by b.data_content

select student_mark,count(student_mark) as total
from student_info
group by student_mark

select student_pro,count(student_pro) as total
from student_info
group by student_pro
select * from student_info where student_id in ( select student_id from track_record_info where next_record_time=str_to_date(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') )
